name: Seth Meyers

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: This isn’t about how you feel, this is about how voters feel. If you truly believe that American democracy is at stake—and it is—then you have to act like it. You can’t claim to be the last bulwark against fascism and also have a ‘more sleep’ plan.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Biden had a bad debate performance and Democrats are having a vigorous back and forth over whether he should stay in. Donald Trump fomented a violent coup attempt and was convicted of 34 felony counts and not only did every Republican immediately fall in line, they showed up at the courthouse in matching suits like they were flight attendants on MAGA Airlines.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: That’s right, they’re fighting a second American Revolution to outlaw abortion, make Trump a dictator, and ban pornography. Which, to clarify, was just about regular jugs.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: The bar for campaign promises has really been lowered. It used to be stuff like, ‘I will safeguard Social Security,’ or ‘I will create jobs.’ Now we’re down to, ‘I won’t eat you.'

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: If I had to describe President Biden’s performance in fireworks terms, he was either the one that doesn’t ignite or the one where the bottle tips over and blows up your house.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A growing number of Democrats want Biden to drop out. If he doesn’t, their only plan is to tie a bunch of balloons to the White House and hope he floats away like the old guy from Up .

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: The media has spent almost two weeks calling on a candidate to drop out of the race and somehow it’s not the convicted felon.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Some high-profile Democrats like Rob Reiner and Stephen King also want Biden to drop out. You know things are bad when the guys behind Stand By Me won’t stand by you.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Biden’s brushing everyone off. He’s like, ‘People have been telling me not to run for President since 1988. I think I know what I’m doing.'

name: Jimmy Fallon

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Its pretty nuch a reverse Olympics. First you get the gold, then you do the 100-meter dash to the bathroom.

name: Jon Stewart

name: Jon Stewart

name: Unknown
monologue: Okay, here’s the thing. I would vote for a skeleton over Donald Trump. In fact, I may literally be voting for a skeleton over Donald Trump.
